item.title: Switching from Disqus to Giscus (GitHub Discussions)
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: In the story of this blog I used WordPress, and using the WordPress comments then moved to Discus as it was better at handling spam. Then I switched this blog to GitHub with first Jekyll with markdown then finally to Hugo, this worked well enough.
